name: CYPRESS MEDIA, INC., d/b/a The Times Leader and Jennifer Learn, Appellants v. HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT
name_abbreviation: Cypress Media, Inc. v. Hazleton Area School District

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: CYPRESS MEDIA, INC., d/b/a The Times Leader and Jennifer Learn, Appellants v. HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Burt M. Rubin, Edward D. Roger, for Cypress Media, Inc., et al.
Edward P. McNelis, Hazleton, for Hazleton Area School Dist.
casebody.head_matter:
724 A.2d 347
CYPRESS MEDIA, INC., d/b/a The Times Leader and Jennifer Learn, Appellants v. HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Feb. 1, 1999.
Decided Feb. 24, 1999.
Burt M. Rubin, Edward D. Roger, for Cypress Media, Inc., et al.
Edward P. McNelis, Hazleton, for Hazleton Area School Dist.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
